languages.text:
The Bounty Hunter's first {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in a round grants their allies a stacking +<u>(target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 3)</u>% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat.
Once a character with this bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g}, the bonus is removed.
languages.original_text:
Когда охотник за головами совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} в первый раз за раунд, союзники получают суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} цели охотника за головами + бонус ВОС охотника за головами / 3)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g} до конца боя.
Персонаж теряет бонус, как только выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезарядку{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The Hunter's first critical hit in a round grants their allies a stacking +<u>(target's difficulty tier+Hunter's PER bonus)%</u> bonus to armour penetration until the end of combat.
Once a character with this bonus reloads, the bonus is removed.

The Hunter's first critical hit in a round grants their allies a stacking +<u>(target's difficulty tier + Hunter's PER bonus)</u>% bonus to armour penetration until the end of combat.
Once a character with this bonus reloads, the bonus is removed.

The Bounty Hunter's first {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in a round grants their allies a stacking +<u>(target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 3)</u>% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat.
Once a character with this bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g}, the bonus is removed.

The Hunter's first {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} grants their allies a stacking +<u>(target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 3)</u>% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat.
Once a character with this bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g}, the bonus is removed.

The Bounty Hunter's first {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in a round grants their allies a stacking +<u>(target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 3)</u>% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat.
Once a character with this bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g}, the bonus is removed.

traits.locale_text:
Когда охотник совершает критическое попадание в первый раз за раунд, союзники получают суммирующийся бонус +<u>(уровень сложности цели + бонус ВОС охотника)</u>% к пробитию брони до конца боя.
Персонаж теряет бонус, как только выполняет перезарядку.

Когда охотник совершает критическое попадание в первый раз за раунд, союзники получают суммирующийся бонус +<u>(уровень сложности цели + бонус ВОС охотника)</u>% к пробитию брони до конца боя.
Персонаж теряет бонус, как только выполняет перезарядку.

languages.text:
当赏金猎人在一整轮中首次造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，可以使所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高<u>（目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}+赏金猎人的感知{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/3）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。
当获得此加成效果的角色{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装弹{/g}时，此加成效果消失。
languages.original_text:
The Bounty Hunter's first {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in a round grants their allies a stacking +<u>(target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 3)</u>% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat.
Once a character with this bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g}, the bonus is removed.

traits.locale_text:
当猎人在一整{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，可以使所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高<u>（目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}+猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。
当获得此加成效果的角色{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装弹{/g}时，此加成效果消失。

当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}在一整{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，可以使所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高<u>（目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}+赏金猎人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/3）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。
当获得此加成效果的角色{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装弹{/g}时，此加成效果消失。

languages.text:
El primer {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} que obtenga el cazarrecompensas en un asalto confiere a sus aliados una bonificación acumulativa de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del objetivo + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por PER del cazarrecompensas / 3)</u> % a la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} hasta el final del combate.
Cuando un personaje beneficiado por esta bonificación lleve a cabo una {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g}, la bonificación se pierde.
languages.original_text:
The Bounty Hunter's first {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in a round grants their allies a stacking +<u>(target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 3)</u>% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat.
Once a character with this bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g}, the bonus is removed.

traits.locale_text:
El primer {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} que obtenga el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} confiere a sus aliados una bonificación acumulativa de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del objetivo + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} del cazarrecompensas / 3)</u> % a la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} hasta el final del combate.
Cuando un personaje beneficiado por esta bonificación lleve a cabo una {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g}, la bonificación se pierde.

languages.text:
Der erste {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Treffer{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers in einer Runde gewährt seinen Verbündeten bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen stapelbaren Bonus von +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des Ziels + WAH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers / 3)</u> % auf {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}.
Sobald ein Charakter mit diesem Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}nachlädt{/g}, wird der Bonus entfernt.
languages.original_text:
The Bounty Hunter's first {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in a round grants their allies a stacking +<u>(target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 3)</u>% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat.
Once a character with this bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g}, the bonus is removed.

traits.locale_text:
Der erste {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Treffer{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjägers{/g} in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} gewährt seinen Verbündeten bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen stapelbaren Bonus von +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des Ziels + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers / 3)</u> % auf {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}.
Sobald ein Charakter mit diesem Bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}nachlädt{/g}, wird der Bonus entfernt.

languages.text:
Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} porté par le chasseur de primes au cours d'un round confère à ses alliés un bonus cumulatif de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la cible + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de PER du chasseur de primes /3)</u> % sur la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
En cas de {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}rechargement{/g} d'un personnage bénéficiant de ce bonus, ce dernier est supprimé.
languages.original_text:
The Bounty Hunter's first {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in a round grants their allies a stacking +<u>(target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 3)</u>% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat.
Once a character with this bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g}, the bonus is removed.

traits.locale_text:
Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} porté par le Chasseur au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} confère à ses alliés un bonus cumulatif de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de la cible + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} du Chasseur)</u> % sur la {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration de l'armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
En cas de {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}rechargement{/g} d'un personnage bénéficiant de ce bonus, celui-ci est supprimé.

languages.text:
バウンティハンターのラウンド中の初めての{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}で、戦闘終了まで、味方の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}に +<u>(ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g} + バウンティハンターのPER{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 3)</u>%のボーナスが与えられる。
このボーナスを得たキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}すると、ボーナスは解除される。
languages.original_text:
The Bounty Hunter's first {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} in a round grants their allies a stacking +<u>(target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} + Bounty Hunter's PER {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 3)</u>% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat.
Once a character with this bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g}, the bonus is removed.

traits.locale_text:
バウンティハンターのラウンド中の初めての{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}で、戦闘終了まで、味方の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}に +<u>(ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g} + バウンティハンターのPER{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 3)</u>%のボーナスが与えられる。
このボーナスを得たキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}すると、ボーナスは解除される。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中の初めての{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}で、戦闘終了まで、味方の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}に +<u>(ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g} + バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 3)</u>%のボーナスが与えられる。
このボーナスを得たキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}すると、ボーナスは解除される。

languages.text:
Ödül Avcısı'nın bir raunttaki ilk {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşu{/g}, dost birimlerine +%<u>(hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesi{/g} + Ödül Avcısı'nın ALG {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} / 3)</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değeri kazandırır. Bu bonuslar üst üste birikebilir ve etkileri çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
Bu bonusa sahip bir karakter, silahını {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}doldurduğunda{/g} bonus da ortadan kalkar.

Once a character with this bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g}, the bonus is removed.
